name: forerunner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something or someone that acts as an early and less advanced model for what will appear in the future, or a warning or sign of what is to follow: forerunner of Germany's Green party was said to be the forerunner of environmental parties throughout Europe. The drop in share prices in March was a forerunner of the financial crash that followed in June.

Add to word list
Add to word list
an early, often less advanced model of something: His machine was a forerunner of the modern computer.
